items/furniture/starter_farm_set/field_c: Use this item to clear decorative details from a grass tile.
items/furniture/starter_farm_set/field_f: Use this item to add a single flower detail to a grass tile.
Use this item to add two flower details to a grass tile.
items/furniture/starter_farm_set/field_g: Use this item to add a grass blade detail to a grass tile.
Use this item to add two grass blade details to a grass tile.
